task_descriptions: Your are @PersonName-1 and would like to make an appointment with @DoctorName-1 for @Day-1 at @StartTimeHour-1. Your symptoms are @Symptoms-1.
completion_requirements: You have made a request for the appointment. Either it was succesfully scheduled or the doctor was busy at the requested time.
completion_questions: ...stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

Wizard.task_description: Help the user book a doctor appointment!
completion_requirements: You have booked an appointment for the user,
completion_questions: ...change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
...become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue?
